mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet ( user_id, animal_name, animal_species, animal_adoption_date, birth_date, gender, animal_memo, image_path, create_id, update_id, del_yn ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{animalName}, #{animalSpecies}, #{animalAdoptionDate}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{animalMemo}, #{imagePath}, #{createId}, #{updateId}, #{delYn}
